chapter.title: JBossWS-wsrunclient
chapter.para: wsrunclient is a command line tool that invokes a JBossWS JAX-WS Web Service client. It builds the correct classpath and endorsed libs for you. Feel free to use the code for this script to make your own shell scripts. It is open source after all.
